OOC: It's ok, logo.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:OOC: I know, I know. I messed up. So it's taking me a while to get 
back into the swing of things. I made a mistake. YES! THE ALMIGHTY 
LOGO MESSED UP! happy now? cool. now back to the RPG.

Repost
DeathSteel::
Back in the quarters he was given, he relaxed in the chair and 
refreshed his memory of the past few days. For now, he would bide his 
time wait for the perfect oppertunity to crush his enemies, the 
maximals.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> OOC: I thought DeathSteel was with the Tripredacus.
>  Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: isn't DeathSteel with nwo?
> 
> 
> >From: "raccoon7679" >Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >To: 
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >Subject: DeathSteel >Date: Thu, 06 Mar 2003 
16:26:29 -0000 > >DeathSteel:: >He leaned against the back wall of 
the room and crossed his arms >infront of his chest. He nodded at 
KitKat's question as to when do >they do battle. He too wanted to 
fight. But not if he wasn't sure of >victory. One fights when one has 
the advantage. So far, unless the >maximals were a smaller number 
than they were, he didn't see an >obvious advantage over his nemesis. 
He waited for Hydras to make the >final decision. >
